titleStmt.title: SII 6.34: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 34. (A.R. No. 84 of 1897). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE SECOND PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
. svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravartti koṉerimeṉkoṇṭāṉ Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭup pāmpūrnāṭṭu Uṭaiyār tirunākiśvaramuṭaiyār koyiṟ tevarkaṉmikkum śrīmāheśvarakkaṇkāṇi ceyvārkkum śrīkāriyañceyvāṉukkum Aṭukkaḷaippeṇṭukaḷil muppu Uyyavantāḷ Irājaviccātiri Ittevar tiruviḻā veḻuntaruḷum nāṭkaḷil kāveriyil tirttam prasātikkaveḻun
taruḷun tiruvitiyun tiruttoppumāka Ivaḷ Iṉṉāṭṭuc cuṅkattavuttacoḻanallūril naṟaiyūrkiḻavaṉ Araiyaṉ nacciṉāṟkiṉiyāṉ tillaiyampalamuventaveḷāṉum piccatevaṉ kuṉikkumapirāṉum pakkal vilaikoṇṭa pramāṇappaṭiyum brahmadeśaM tirukkuṭamukkil piṭākai viracoḻanallūrilum coḻakaṅka marāmanallūrilum virutarājapayaṅkaranallūrilum Ivvūrroṭum tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili māṟik kūṭiṉa kiḻāna
naṭimaṅkalattilum vāṇakulaviḷakkamaṅkalattilum Uṭaiyār Irājarājiśvaramuṭaiyār tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili tu māṭilaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ nakkkaṉāṉa poṉmentacoḻappiramamārāyaṉperil Āttirayaṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉṉāṉa neṟiUṭaiccoḻappiramamārāyaṉum pāratāya āṇṭaṉum viyākkirapātaṉ Appiramekaṉ karuṇākaraṉum Ivaṉai mutukaṇṇākavuṭaiya Ivaṉ peraṉ caokkaṉ Ārāvamutu
pperumāṉum kevutamaṉ kaṇṇaṉ kāraṇaṉum māṭilaṉ māṟaṉ śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭasarvvakratuvāyaveyāciyārum vaṭukaṉ mātevapaṭṭaṉum kāraṇa Agnicittaṉum civatevaṉ cemaṉum vighneśvaraṉ pāṇṭaṉun tāḻai nārāyaṇaṉum māṟaṉ cāttapaṭṭa Agnicit=taṉum māṟaṉ viṉāyakatevaṉum pālāṣriyaṉ parameṣṭi śrīkṛṣṇapaṭṭaṉum Iraṇiyakeṟppaṉ tāmotaraṉum cakrapāṇi kecavaṉum kevutamaṉ jātavetaṉai mutukaṇṇākavuṭaiya Ivaṉ tampi kāmakkāṇi mātevaṉum mokiliyaṉ tiruva
ṭikaḷ cūriyaṉum kāmakkāṇi Iḷaiyacirāmaṉ vaṭukaṉum cirāmaṉ caṅkaraṉum tiraṅkuṭaiyāṉ Umaiyaṉ tiruvuḷḷaṉum pakkal vilaikoṇṭa pramāṇappaṭiyum kavuṇiyaṉ yogeśvaraṉ vāsutevapaṭṭaṉum pūṇṭiyuṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉumuṭaṉ parivarttaṉai paṇṇiṉa nilattukku Ivarkaḷ Eḻuttiṭṭa tiṭṭuppaṭiyuñ cuṅkattavuttacoḻanallūrilum Ivvūṟ piṟinta kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ paṉṟimaṅkalattilum naṟaiyūrkiḻavaṉ nacciṉāṟkiṉiyāṉ tillaiAmpalamuventaveḷāṉum paṉṟimaṅkalamuṭai
yāṉ poṉṉampalakkūttaṉum ciṅkaḷatevaṉum naccināṟkiṉiyāṉum maṭappuṟakkuṭaiyāṉ periyāṉum Ikkoyil Āticaṇṭeśvaratevar pātattu nirvārttuk kuṭutta nilattukku Ivarkaḷ Eḻuttiṭṭa pramāṇappaṭi yinnilamāy tukku Ūrkaṇakkut tirukkuṭantaiyuṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttiṭṭa kaṇakkuppaṭi brahmadeyam tirukkuṭamukkil nirnila maraiye yiraṇṭumā varaikkāṇiyum puṉcey nilam mummā varaiyeyaraikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻmukkālum Āka nilam mukkāle mukkā
ṇi muntirikaik kiḻmukkālum Uḷḷaṉa vaḷakkak kuṟainta nilattopāti nilaṅ kāṇi yaraikkāṇik kiḻmukkāṇik kiḻmukkāle Orumā mukkāṇi yaraikkāṇiyum cuṅkattavutta kulottuṅkacoḻadevarkkup patiṉāṟāva taḷakkak kuṟainta nilatto ṇi muntirikaik kiḻkkāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻeṭṭumāk kāṇi Araikkāṇi muntirikaiyum Āka nilam mukkāle mākāṇi yaraikkāṇik kiḻmukkāle mākāṇi yaraikkāṇik kiḻ la kāṇi
muntirikaiyum cuṅkantavuttacoḻanallūṟ nilam nālumā raikkāṇi muntirikaik kiḻ kulottuṅkacoḻaṉ paṉṟimaṅkalattu nila morumāviṉ kiḻmukkāle Orumāvum ṟa Orumā mukkāṇi Araikkāṇik kiḻmukkāle mākāṇi yaraikkāṇik kiḻmukkāle kāṇi muntirikaiyum paṇṭuṭaiyārum paḻamperum Uṭaiyār rājarājiśvaramuṭaiyār tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili lattu niṉṟa tteva tevatāṉa
Iṟaiyiliyāy varumpaṭiyun tavirttu Iṉṉāṭṭut tirunākiśvaranallūro ṭiyuṅ kūṭiṉa nilam Iṟaikaṭṭukku tavirntu patiṉālāvatu pacāṉamutal niṅkalāka nikkiyum variyilārum varikkukkūṟuceyvārkaḷum Eḻut ṉom tiruvitiyun toppum patiṉālāvatu pacāṉamutal niṅkalākak kaikkoḷka Eḻutiṉāṉ tirumantiraOlai miṉavaṉmuventaveḷāṉ Eḻutak kurukularāyarum pāṇṭiyarāyarum viḻinattaraiyarum prathiyaṅkarai mākoṉārum Eḻuttiṭṭup patiṉālāvatu nāḷ
muṉṉūṟṟaimpattu muṉṟiṉāl prasātañceytaruḷittu .
Digital edition of SII 6.34 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
